phrs.translation: 免疫学家, 免疫科医生, 畭
实验室免疫学家, 实验室免疫
临床免疫过敏症, 临床免疫和过敏症专治医师
免疫及过敏症专治医师

sentences.sentence: A few years ago, a well-known research immunologist injected himself with hookworms and reduced his allergic symptoms (shudder).
sentences.translation: 很多年前，一位知名的免疫学家就曾给自己注射钩虫，来减轻自己的过敏症状。

sentences.sentence: Long dismissed as "cannon fodder," as one immunologist puts it, the white blood cells known as basophils have been enjoying a Renaissance.
sentences.translation: 嗜碱性细胞长久以来被当作炮灰而遭到忽略，而如今，如同一名免疫学家所讲，迎来了它的复兴。

sentences.sentence: When Daniel Douek, an NIH immunologist suggested to members of the study team that endotoxins might be a key reason why, some were skeptical.
sentences.translation: 当国立卫生研究院的免疫学家Daniel Douek，向研究小组的成员建议内毒素可能是一个关键原因，但一些人持怀疑态度。
